attributes.review: So I download this app because I love our president he is amazing 😉 beautiful orange 🍊 and then every thing went wrong when I downloaded this app my cat was saying “trump 🇺🇸 2020 🇺🇸 in a gravestone” over and over again and he wouldn’t stop also my parents screamed “george Floyd” and they wouldn’t stop I felt like an orange 🍊 was possessing my family and my pet soon my sister walked in and started screaming! I was scared for my life that orange 🍊 Cheeto was possessing my family by downloading the app don’t download this app I’m warning ⚠️ you🧚✨🥰your not a clown🥺✨🧚🥰your the whole circus🥰🧚✨❤️
attributes.title: I’m scared

attributes.review: Do not download this app! I downloaded TOTALLY in support of the Trump re-election only to find that when I open the app all my N-95 masks starting to vanish into the air!! I quickly tried to get ahold of them but right when they were within my grasp they turned to dust🤬 Then HELLO Mr. COVID-19 who has been waiting outside my window with a sly grin on his face waiting for a moment to catch a slip and STRIKE, gets pulled in from the OUTSIDE with a very STRONG MAGNETIC FORCE when I look to see where it was coming from I COULDN’T BELIEVE MY EYES. IT WAS MY PHONE. And guess what was on the screen.., THE OPENNING PAGE OF THIS VERY APP!!!
attributes.title: Attracted the Corona Virus😳😷

attributes.review: It took 6 and a half hours to download even with 4 bars of wifi, and once it downloaded it gave my phone a virus! I would have deleted it but i wanted to support out president so i kept it. Biggest mistake of my life. The app wouldn’t let me open any other apps or have any apps running in the background and made my whole phone eventually crash. I had to buy a whole new phone because even after doing a factory reset it was unusable. If i could rate it zero stars i would.
attributes.title: One of the worst working apps I’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review:
When I opened the app, it gave me a screen of complete bs. If you want to spread your campaign, have your bs get to the point. Don’t ask for unnecessary info about someone. Anyways, when I opened the app, I put my phone number in and I was reading the words when my ✨c h a r g i n g ✨ phone died. I looked at my battery settings and this app took 100% of my battery. I was going to go to my friends house and watch his ✨a m a z i n g ✨ speeches but my phone died and I couldn’t go because I needed to charge my phone. This app took an hour of my time that I can’t get back and they just lost another trumper. I’m very busy so I can’t watch his speeches all day, ya know. Currently I am on my break.

attributes.review: I tried typing in the app but it was so orange it gave me Cheeto fingers. Also, as soon as I opened the app, my ears were blasted with “horn of plenty” from the hunger games(Panem national anthem). I was soon swept into a virtual reaping and was chosen to be in the next hunger games😡. And they said my name wrong!😑😤. After getting into the arena I became a target with my Cheeto fingers. Despite the young ages, everybody soon got sick with covid-19 and died, but I wore a mask the entire time. So finally I won and was airlifted to trump tower where I was to meet trump. He smelled liked Rachel(the big fat nasty...). So in true shark tank fashion: for that reason, I’m out.
attributes.title: Orange

attributes.review: Once I got this app, I lost half of my weight 😬 here’s why. So when I first opened the app, I saw a picture of Donald trumps face 🍊 right after that I was barfing my guts out.🤮 That went on for two hours 🕰 now I’m in the hospital 🏥 I called trump knowing he had the power to help me. I told him what happened and he didn’t want to help me 😭 he said he was too busy marking racist comments and commenting on women’s bodies 🤦🏽‍♀️ he also said it didn’t matter if he didn’t help me because it was just a hoax ❌ now I’m on my death bed💀thanks a lot u **** ******* **** *** ******** 🤬
attributes.title: I lost half of my weight

attributes.review: There are just so many problems with the app. First of many, it took me multiple hours to download and I even had to get rid of multiple of my apps to make space for it, and I regret doing so. Once I opened the app, it would simply not load even though I have Wifi. It kept shutting off my phone and I never even got it to work. After a half hour of trying to get it to work, I finally deleted the app. I wish I had kept the 4 apps I had to delete to make space for this trash one. Do not get this app!
attributes.title: Do not download!!!

attributes.review: This dried Cheeto lookin racist homophobic islamiphobic white supremacist we have as a president is now trying to take my only source of entertainment away cause he can’t take getting his feelings hurt I decided to check out his app DO NOT DOWNLOAD it is very confusing to use it is very glitchy and kills your battery 🧚‍♀️✨💕you can’t take away the only thing that keeps me alive (TikTok)🧚‍♀️✨💕 plus they have a trump side of TikTok nobody like but you would hurt your little followers feelings 😢 but I don’t care about that if you do take it away we have another app in store so stop❤️

attributes.review: Glitches every time I get on so I can’t even click on anything, and when you open it, it is only open for like 1 minute and then it automatically closes the app, and for some reason when when it glitches my screen turned orange sometimes but I think that’s because it’s a poorly made app, who ever made this app needs to re think on how to make an app before publishing it, like come on, this app is trash and needs a whole software update, but most of all this app should not exist because of how bad it is.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
